Articles.Content:
Hello, I have finally gotten round to posting a welcome message in this place!

However I do have a question that is nagging me - how do I use Imgur and Hastebin (for pictures and logs)?

Howdy, pardner!

The code for imgur albums is [noparse]

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/your)

[/noparse]
For all other images, it is [noparse]![url here (no uploads from your computer!!)](url%20here%20(no%20uploads%20from%20your%20computer!!))[/noparse]

If you want to add a linked picture, it is [noparse]![www.theurlyouwanttolinkto.com](www.theurlyouwanttolinkto.com)picture URL here (no uploads from your computer!!)[/noparse]
Hello hello! And yup, Dman got it covered for you.
